TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void WebPartVerbsEventHandler(object sender, WebPartVerbsEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed WebPartVerbsEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub WebPartVerbsEventHandler(sender As Object, e As WebPartVerbsEventArgs)
public delegate void WebPartVerbsEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, WebPartVerbsEventArgs ^ e);
type WebPartVerbsEventHandler = delegate of obj * WebPartVerbsEventArgs -> unit

span.span: Represents the delegate for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于指定为响应 事件而调用的方法，当为从 类派生的区域创建 Web 部件谓词时发生此事件。The class is used to specify the methods that are invoked in response to a event, which occurs when the Web Parts verbs are created for a zone that derives from the class. Web 部件谓词表示用户可在 Web 部件页的用户界面（UI）中执行的操作，例如最小化、关闭或还原控件;向页面添加控件;或取消操作。Web Parts verbs represent actions that users can perform in the user interface (UI) of a Web Parts page, such as minimizing, closing, or restoring controls; adding controls to a page; or canceling an action. 谓词既可以出现在区域的标头区域中，也可以同时出现在 Web 部件控制集和自定义谓词（可由开发人员添加）中。Verbs can appear in both the header and footer areas of a zone, and there are both standard verbs provided with the Web Parts control set, and custom verbs that can be added by developers. 谓词在 UI 中由可单击的对象表示，您可以使用 属性将其设置为显示为超链接、图像或按钮。A verb is represented in the UI by a clickable object, which you can set to appear as a hyperlink, an image, or a button, by using the property. 区域提供一组标准谓词，该谓词在 Web 部件控件的谓词菜单中呈现。A zone provides a standard set of verbs that get rendered in a Web Parts control's verbs menu. 自定义 Web 部件区域，或 Web 部件区域内的 Web 部件控件，可以向菜单添加其他谓词。A custom Web Parts zone, or a Web Parts control inside a Web Parts zone, can add additional verbs to the menu. Web 部件区域中的控件可以通过从 基类继承并重写 属性，将谓词添加到控件的谓词菜单。A control in a Web Parts zone can add verbs to the control's verbs menu by inheriting from the base class and overriding the property. 如果该控件不从 基类继承，则可以通过实现 接口，然后重写 集合来添加一个新谓词。If the control does not inherit from the base class, you can add a new verb by implementing the interface, and then overriding the collection. 通过 protected 方法，派生类可以重写事件，而无需附加委托。The protected method allows derived classes to override the event without attaching a delegate to it. 派生类必须始终调用基类的 方法，以确保注册的委托接收事件。A derived class must always call the method of the base class to ensure that registered delegates receive the event.

related.span: ASP.NET 服务器控件事件模型
